I use a copy of "ConvertXtoDVD" that I found on here. You just select the file and convert. It stays in the original format.

@dabs139

ey! you can use any dvd ripper. there is an option to what output format you want say .avi, .mpeg, etc... accompanied by the size of frame you want say widescreen at 1280 x 800, etc...
